update_camera_configuration¶

update_camera_configuration.reduce_dictionary(input_dictionary, keys_kept)¶

Takes a dictionary and removes any keys not specified.

Parameters

  • input_dictionary – Requested number of bins.

  • keys_kept – Requested number of bins.

Returns

The input dictionary but reduced to the keys specified.

Return type

reduced_dictionary

update_camera_configuration.update_camera_configuration(parameter_dictionary)¶

Takes a dictionary and removes any keys not specified.

Parameters

  • input_dictionary – Requested number of bins.

  • keys_kept – Requested number of bins.

Returns

The input dictionary but reduced to the keys specified.

Return type

reduced_dictionary
